tool_description: This API removes Images Background, leaving the object intact
title: Remove Background

api_list.name: Removes Background from Images
api_list.description: This Endpoint removes Background from Images while keeping the Objects cropped and intact
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://remove-background2.p.rapidapi.com/remove"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "remove-background2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Welcome
api_list.description: This Endpoint welcome you to the Service
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://remove-background2.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "remove-background2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
